summary: This document consists of three consecutive shift logs from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, NY, covering the evening of July 5, 2019, through the day of July 6, 2019. The logs detail routine prison operations, counts, and inmate movements, including the placement of inmate Jeffrey Epstein in a housing unit on July 5. The logs also note an inmate at a local hospital under USMS guard.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Listed as inmate #76318-054. Log entry on July 5, 2019, at 9:27 PM notes his movement to housing unit 5N.

persons.name: Burnett
persons.context: Listed as inmate #76254-054. Log entry on July 6, 2019, at 12:39 AM notes a +1 count for the local hospital, suggesting this inmate was hospitalized.

persons.name: Johnson
persons.context: Listed as inmate #50972-054. Log entry on July 6, 2019, at 9:15 AM notes his removal from unit KN to ZA and placement in Administrative Detention for an SIS investigation.

events.title: Epstein Moved to Unit 5N
events.description: At 9:27 PM, inmate Jeffrey Epstein (#76318-054) was moved to housing unit 5N within the Metropolitan Correctional Center.

events.title: Inmate Johnson Placed in Administrative Detention
events.description: At 9:15 AM, inmate Johnson (#50972-054) was removed from unit KN to ZA and placed in Administrative Detention due to an SIS (Special Investigative Services) investigation.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, NY
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein, inmate #76318-054, was recorded as being moved to housing unit 5N at the MCC at 9:27 PM on July 5, 2019.
The logs confirm Epstein was in custody at the MCC in New York in early July 2019, shortly before his death on July 10, 2019.
Another inmate, Burnett (#76254-054), was noted as being at a local hospital under USMS guard during this period.
Routine prison operations, including multiple inmate counts and security checks, were documented as normal aside from minor system malfunctions.
The logs are official Department of Justice records from the MCC, marked as CONFIDENTIAL.
